name: Holedown (itch)
description:
Ever wondered how would the gold rush look if we used explosive machine-guns for mining? No? Well, too bad, because this game has exactly that. 

Dig down with explosive bullets while avoiding vicious pigs, upgrade your character to dig further! Can you reach the end? 

Please note that we didn't have time to give the game a proper ending.
This was made in the last 3 days of the Jam.

Game made by these beautiful people:

Harman Kamboj - art, programming, design, concept
kintrix - art, programming, design
Arcy - sound, music
Spencer - music
